title: McCormac - Structural Steel Design 5th International c2012 txtbk
description:
Structural Steel Design, 5th International Edition (c2012), textbook by Jack C. McCormac & Stephen F. Csernak.

TEXTBOOK INFO:
Int'l: <a href=" http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/pearsonhigheredgb/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780273751359" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://catalogue.pearsoned.co.uk/pearsonhigheredgb/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780273751359</a>
Nat'l: <a href=" http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780136079484" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.pearsonhighered.com/pearsonhigheredus/educator/product/products_detail.page?isbn=9780136079484</a>

NOTE: The 5th international (global) and national editions differ only by the cover, the copyright page and the way pages are numbered.

BRIEF CONTENTS:
--------------
1. Introduction to Structural Steel Design
2. Specifications, Loads, and Methods of Design
3. Analysis of Tension Members
4. Design of Tension Members
5. Introduction to Axially Loaded Compression Members
6. Design of Axially Loaded Compression Members
7. Design of Axially Loaded Compression Members (Continued) and Column Base Plates
8. Introduction to Beams
9. Design of Beams for Moments
10. Design of Beams - Miscellaneous Topics (Shear, Deflection, etc.)
11. Bending and Axial Force
12. Bolted Connections
13. Eccentrically Loaded Bolted Connections and Historical Notes on Rivets
14. Welded Connections
15. Building Connections
16. Composite Beams
17. Composite Columns
18. Cover-Plated Beams and Built-up Girders
19. Design of Steel Buildings
APPENDICES:
 A: Derivation of the Euler Formula
 B: Slender Compression Elements
 C: Flexural-Torsional Buckling of Compression Members
 D: Moment-Resisting Column Base Plates
 E: Ponding

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked (basic), true PDF.
